sensory: Wacky Web: Cotton spider webs, plastic animals, orange and black objects
raw_excerpt: CHICAGO CONTEMPORARY PRESCHOOL PRE K Classroom: Pre-K Week of: 10/27-10/31 Weekly Theme: Happy Halloween Circle Time books include Room on the Broom, Arthur's Halloween, Scaredy-Cat Splat, How to Catch a Witch, and How to Make Friends With a Ghost. Activities include crafts, math games, science experiments, and sensory play.
